resources.string:
This application pulls recent apps from the CyanogenMod ROM and attempts to install them via. Root or non-root methods onto any ROM on a device.

I cannot guarantee compatibility with the applications and your device, and I do not take responsibility if it breaks your device (though 'uninstall' will often revert any problems caused). It has been extensively tested for your peace of mind, and I hope you have success in installing these applications.

Feel free to contact me below, or if you like my work, buy me a drink :)

thementalgoose@gmail.com

Code

This window will show the code used to remount, copy, or move apks to the system directory

Note: These are only if you install them as root applications! If not, then they are installed normally

These commands run as if they're run in terminal emulator, through java code using a Runtime Process.

Request superuser
 su

Remount System for read-write privilages
 > mount -o remount,rw -t yaffs2 /dev/block/mtdblock3 /system

Remount System for read-only privilages
 > mount -o remount,ro -t yaffs2 /dev/block/mtdblock3 /system

Copy
 > cat directory/file.apk > system/app/file.apk

Permissions
 > chmod 644 /system/app/file.apk

Remove
 > rm -r /system/app/file.apk

Reboot
 > reboot
-Removed. Proved too unstable.
